description:
Astro gets a downgrade. Hutch gives a shout out to his mom on Boyacky`s Room. Lightan wants to go for a lighter gold. The nerd`s breathing intensifies.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Astro Finally Has a Body Change / Boyacky`s Room / Gold Lightan and Ambassador Magma`s Sentimental Journey: Kinkakuji / Otaku-kun Starts Streaming
Atom Tsui ni Body Change / Boyacky no Heya (Guest: Hacchi) / Raitan to Magma no Junjou Otoko Tabi: Kinkakuji Hen / Otaku-kun: Douga Haishin Hajimeyou ka to...
アトムついにボディチェンジ / ボヤッキーの部屋 (ゲスト: ハッチ) / ライタンとマグマの純情男旅 金閣寺編 / オタクくん 動画配信始めようかと...
